oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Khojki primer with various passages for reading practice.
Published by the Manager of the Bombay Shia Imami Ismaili Khoja Jamat Dept of Education for the Siñdhī Textbook Committee.
Covers missing; binding in fair condition, paper in good condition.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.
